name: Canyon Crashers
description:
Help Penny & Earl strike it rich exploring the mines of Prospect Canyon!

Journey deep into Prospect’s twisting mines collecting precious gems, using awesome power ups, and keeping your speed and combos as high as you can! It’s a totally new take on puzzle games. An action-packed experience like you’ve never played before!

- Unique and intense high-speed gameplay blends puzzle and runner genres into a brand new never-ending experience!
- Beautiful and vibrant HD visuals in full 3D
- Simple to learn gameplay that’s impossible to master! Are you up for the challenge?
- Unleash Mega Diamond Rush, use Powerful Bombs, and give your carts a Rocket Powered Boost
- Unlock crazy new carts with amazing special abilities
- Challenge friends and compete to see who the Master Canyon Crasher really is!
